long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that allows you to reply to tweets with AI powered responses. 

It uses openAI's gpt 3.5 turbo API currently and you will need to use your own key + prompt. Instructions on how to get your open AI key are one the home site :)

Support for other open AI models will be coming soon.
